amendment.description: To include assessments of Traumatic Brain Injury in the post-deployment health assessments of member of the Armed Forces returning from deployment in support of a contingency operation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4224 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4224 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Obama. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6348) To include assessments of Traumatic Brain Injury in the post-deployment health assessments of member of the Armed Forces returning from deployment in support of a contingency operation.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4224 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Obama.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4224 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
